mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.status AS "status", a.version AS "version", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.parent_ids AS "parent_ids", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", p.name AS "parent.name", a.name AS "name", a.short_name AS "shortName", a.code AS "code", a.type AS "type", a.sort AS "sort", a.remark AS "remark"
LEFT JOIN t_sys_area p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_sys_area a
WHERE a.code = #{code} AND a.status = '0'

SELECT
FROM t_sys_area a
WHERE a.status = #{STATUS_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.code
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM t_sys_area a WHERE a.status = #{STATUS_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.code

SELECT
FROM t_sys_area a
a.status = '0'
AND a.parent_id = #{parentId}
AND (a.parent_id IS NULL OR a.parent_id == '')
ORDER BY a.code

SELECT
FROM t_sys_area a
WHERE a.status = '0'
AND (a.id = #{parentId} OR a.parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{parentId}||',%' CONCAT('%,', #{parentId}, ',%') '%,'||#{parentId}||',%')
ORDER BY a.code

SELECT
FROM t_sys_area a
WHERE a.status = #{STATUS_NORMAL} AND a.type IN (2,3,4)

SELECT
FROM t_sys_area a
a.status = '0'
AND (a.id = #{areaId} OR a.parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{areaId}||',%' CONCAT('%,', #{areaId}, ',%') '%,'||#{areaId}||',%')
AND a.type IN (4,5,6)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_area( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, parent_id, parent_ids, name, short_name, code, type, sort, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 0, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{shortName}, #{code}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_area SET status = #{status}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, short_name = #{shortName}, code = #{code}, type = #{type}, sort = #{sort}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_sys_area SET status = #{STATUS_DELETE}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%') '%,'||#{id}||',%'
